title: Carol Vorderman shows off her peachy bottom in red leather trousers
text:
She famously won Rear Of The Year twice - in 2011 and again in 2014.

And Carol Vorderman, 58, proved exactly why when she showed off her incredibly peachy bottom while wearing some red spray-on leather trousers.

The former Countdown whizz shared a video of herself jumping up and down with excitement on social media on Sunday as watched the Rugby World Cup.

Carol Vorderman, 58, showed off her peachy bottom in spray-on red leather trousers as she excitedly cheered on Wales in the Rugby World Cup on Sunday

Carol was supporting Wales as they played France and was thrilled when they won, 20-19, taking them through to the semi-finals.

As well as her (very patriotic) red trousers, Carol also wore a rugby jersey.

However, it wasn't all fun and games for Carol as she later took to Twitter to reveal she had broken her mobile.

Sport: Carol also put on an animated display as she enjoyed the Wales vs Fiji match at the Rugby World Cup in Japan on October 9

She penned: 'Laughing... OBVS I wrecked my mobile yesterday in @WelshRugbyUnion celebrations.. well, wouldn't be a @rugbyworldcup celebration without a wrecking huh?

'BUT I don't know my own home number, cos it's on my mobile, soooo... hmmm #UselessButHappy.'

Carol's mother Edwina was Welsh and the TV personality grew up in Prestatyn, North Wales.

Wild: Carol tweeted that she had broken her phone while celebrating Wales's win

The week before, Carol enjoyed the Wales vs Uruguay match at Kumamoto Stadium in Kumamoto, Japan.

It was a good day for Carol and other Wales supporters as they emerged victorious with a final score of 35-13.

Days before that, she continued to show off her impressive array of rugby jerseys as she enjoyed the Wales v Fiji match at the Rugby World Cup in Japan.

The keen walker will trek 12-20 miles twice a week, adding that she also likes to focus on her famous derriere, saying: 'In terms of squats, or the equivalent of squats, I probably do over 20,000 a year... that's a lot'

Carol admitted that while she keeps in shape she doesn't focus on numbers on the scale, confessing she hasn't weighed herself since 1999. 'I don't actually know how much I weigh and I don't care because I go on my dress size, thank god for lycra!'

'I'm probably about a size 8 to 9 at the moment. I've always had a small waist, I think I'm about 25 inches around my waist.'
description: She famously won Rear Of The Year twice - in 2011 and again in 2014.
